item.title: Ubuntu Python virtual environments pitfalls
item.description:
I always face several pitfalls, while creating isolated python environment on my laptop, where i’m running Ubuntu.

So decided to make a memory note how to fight them, probably it can be helpful to anyone else.

item.title: Python virtual environment on Ubuntu
item.description:
I had some mess around the process of installing those tools on my laptop running Ubuntu, so my decision was to write and explain everything step by step just in a case for the memo and probably a useful post for anyone as well.

Who are those lads?

  • virtualenv
  • virtualenvwrapper
  • pip

If you are not an Ubuntu user, you should better read this Presentation: pip and virtualenv.
